Who is Abraham Kahasha Kabral?
answer: the Founder and Group Chairman of the HAM Groupe (HG), an international investment group of companies committed to improving lives and transforming Africa, East Africa Regional President of Africa Youths Community (AYC), promoting and developing young leaders in 7 East African Countries.

question: Where is he based?
answer: With SDG13 Leadership Training Program for African Climate Ambassadors, Le Caire, Égypt from Ain Shams University, YALI Regional Leadership Centre East Africa, Kenya from Kenyatta University, Computer Engineering from Université du Lac Tanganyika (ULT), Abraham Kahasha Kabral has of experience as a Chairman at HAM GROUPE (HG) in Bujumbura Mairie, Burundi, of experience as a Gorvernance, Policy and Political Inclusion Committe Member at SADC Secretariat in Kinshasa, Kinshasa, Congo (DRC), of experience as a East Africa Regional President of The African Youths Community (AYC), EA Presidency at African Union in Bujumbura Mairie, Burundi, of experience as a Country Director Assistant (CDA) at Global Peace Chain in Kinshasa, Kinshasa, Congo (DRC), of experience as a Global Peace Ambassador (GPA) at Global Peace Chain - Team Nepal in Bukavu, Sud-Kivu, Congo (RDC) and is proficient in Leadership, Community Engagement, Project Management, International Relations, Philanthropy, Entrepreneurship, Nonprofit Organizations, Politics, Engineering, Diplomacy, Coaching, Communication, Management, Training, Youth Development, Youth Empowerment, Youth Programs, Youth Advocacy, Project Governance, International Business Management, Major Gift Solicitations, Board of Directors.
